subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms}}
Borrowed from {{bor|zh|nl|akker||field}} or {{m|nl|morgen||morning}}.<ref name=Andrade>{{cite-book|last=Andrade|first=Tonio|title=How Taiwan Became Chinese: Dutch, Spanish and Han Colonization in the Seventeenth Century|publisher=Columbia University Press|year=2005|chapter=Appendix A: Weights, Measures, and Exchange Rates|chapterurl=http://www.gutenberg-e.org/andrade/appA.html|isbn=9780231503686}}.</ref>

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|Taiwan}} unit of land (area) measure, equivalent to 2,934 {{zh-l|坪}} or 0.97 [[hectare]]s,<ref>{{thcwd|1857}}</ref> roughly 2.1 [[acre]]s
